question.title: skaffold destroys umlauts, Google Cloud Code breaks
question.body:
I have the following problem with skaffold v2.13.2 on Windows 10:

skaffold scrambles the Log output of the build. It does not matter whether this is the standard jib build, Maven or just

echo "Hallo Überschall"

which becomes

\"Hallo �berschall\"

This is not just an aesthetic problem. The Google Cloud Code plugin in IntelliJ stops updating the console when it hits such a broken umlaut. This means that the Java application in Kubernetes starts, but you cannot see anything in the Console in IntelliJ, and you don't get the logs from the container either.

I tried to configure the encoding for skaffold, but not find a way to do it. How can I solve this problem?
